samples.comment: Waited 3 days for a response. When I finally got one, it was a generic template that didn't address my issue at all.
The AI suggested I update my firmware but the firmware update is exactly what caused my problem. Circular logic.
My BIAS FX license disappeared after upgrading my PC. Support says they can't verify my purchase from 2023.
Good agent but could not help because this is a known bug. Why isn't it fixed yet?
